definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
Allies/entente (i.e. Western powers allied to China in WW1)

sentences.english: The Calcite Mineral Kingdom concludes with this suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 方解石矿石王国与此建议有协约。

sentences.english: As a result, they fought on the side of 11)the Allies.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他们站在协约国的一方作战。

sentences.english: More deals allowed foreign companies to explore the desert for other resources.
sentences.chinese: 更多协约允许外国公司在沙漠里开采其他资源。

sentences.english: France and Russia, establish the entente group.
sentences.chinese: 法俄两国，成立协约国集团。

sentences.english: In September 2007 as a treaty member of SkyTeam add.
sentences.chinese: 2007年9月作为协约成员加入天合联盟。

sentences.english: There was a heated propaganda war between the Entente Countries and the Ally Countries during WWI.
sentences.chinese: 协约国和同盟国在一战中展开了激烈的宣传战。

sentences.english: The usual benefits of type safety as enabled by service contracts.
sentences.chinese: 常见的类型安全好处都是通过服务协约实现的。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, 21 allied warships sat in the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 其时，21艘协约国战舰正在港口停泊。

sentences.english: The system contract defines how the adapter handles transactions and security.
sentences.chinese: 系统协约定义了适配器如何处理事务和安全。

sentences.english: The Treaty of Versailles, imposed on Germany, formalized the Allied victory.
sentences.chinese: 强加于德国的《凡尔塞条约》正式宣告协约国的胜利。

definition: contract of alliance/oath or treaty between allies
to agree to and sign (a treaty etc)
